title: Enforcement
context: [ยง302A-1136] Enforcement. The department shall be charged with the enforcement of sections 302A-1132 to 302A-1135. Nothing in this section shall relieve any chief of police or police officer of the chief&rsquo;s or officer&rsquo;s responsibility for the enforcement of these sections, but their enforcement shall be subject to the plans and policies of the department. [L 1996, c 89, pt of ยง2]
